Lag Fixed

Added the CT Spawn Pick from Night Map.

_sText:
--------------------------------------------

Please report any bugs you may find when playing to me!

--------------------------------------------

Suburban Extraction - Hostage Rescue
The Terrorists have taken refuge in a suburban homestead, capturing the tenant and the construction Foreman from the nearby construction zone. Theyâ€™ve Barricaded the place and do not intend to leave. The place is surrounded, and the Counter Terrorist Force is moving in to deal with the threat.

Counter Terrorists:

In a Hostage Situation you cannot be slow and methodical. Once you breach the perimeter, you must conduct a violent and dynamic assault in order to extract the hostages from a barricaded house. Provide cover for the assets as you move to the extraction points, eliminating any hostiles you encounter. Good luck.

Terrorists:

Protect the building, eliminate any hostiles attempting to breach the building, defending the assets from extraction.
